Super-delicious!  I ordered the daily special (includes an app, main course, dessert, and either water or wine): salad, thali, and apple crisp, and hubby ordered the thali and a strawberry & banana smoothie.  Exceptionally good eats and the smoothie was to die for!  Go for the daily special - Yes, it's a ton of food, but for 8.50 euro, you can't beat the price and you get to try a lil something of everything.  I thought the thali with the special would be a reduced portion, but it's not.  They do accept credit cards (5 euro min).  A hit for both a vegetarian and carnivore!
